005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.AbstractDataTypeProvider;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.type.impl.TypeConstants;
010
011import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
012
013/**
014 * Provides runtime discovery of built-in implementations of the core Metaschema
015 * data types.
016 */
017@SuppressWarnings("PMD.CouplingBetweenObjects")
018public final class MetaschemaDataTypeProvider // NOPMD - Used for service initialization
019    extends AbstractDataTypeProvider {
020  /**
021   * The Metaschema <a href=
022   * "https://pages.nist.gov/metaschema/specification/datatypes/#base64">base64</a>
023   * data type instance.
024   */
025  @NonNull
026  public static final Base64Adapter BASE64 = new Base64Adapter();
027  /**
028   * The Metaschema <a href=
029   * "https://pages.nist.gov/metaschema/specification/datatypes/#boolean">boolean</a>
030   * data type instance.
031   */
032  @NonNull
033  public static final BooleanAdapter BOOLEAN = new BooleanAdapter();
034  /**
035   * The Metaschema <a href=
036   * "https://pages.nist.gov/metaschema/specification/datatypes/#date">date</a>
037   * data type instance.
038   */
039  @NonNull
040  public static final DateAdapter DATE = new DateAdapter();
041  /**
042   * The Metaschema <a href=
043   * "https://pages.nist.gov/metaschema/specification/datatypes/#date-with-timezone">date-with-timezone</a>
044   * data type instance.
045   */
046  @NonNull
047  public static final DateWithTZAdapter DATE_WITH_TZ = new DateWithTZAdapter();
048  /**
049   * The Metaschema <a href=
050   * "https://pages.nist.gov/metaschema/specification/datatypes/#date-time">date-time</a>
051   * data type instance.
052   */
053  @NonNull
054  public static final DateTimeAdapter DATE_TIME = new DateTimeAdapter();
055  /**
056   * The Metaschema <a href=
057   * "https://pages.nist.gov/metaschema/specification/datatypes/#date-time-with-timezone">date-time-with-timezone</a>
058   * data type instance.
059   */
060  @NonNull
061  public static final DateTimeWithTZAdapter DATE_TIME_WITH_TZ = new DateTimeWithTZAdapter();
062  /**
063   * The Metaschema <a href=
064   * "https://pages.nist.gov/metaschema/specification/datatypes/#ip-v4-address">ip-v4-address</a>
065   * data type instance.
066   */
067  @NonNull
068  public static final IPv4AddressAdapter IP_V4_ADDRESS = new IPv4AddressAdapter();
069  /**
070   * The Metaschema <a href=
071   * "https://pages.nist.gov/metaschema/specification/datatypes/#ip-v6-address">ip-v6-address</a>
072   * data type instance.
073   */
074  @NonNull
075  public static final IPv6AddressAdapter IP_V6_ADDRESS = new IPv6AddressAdapter();
076  /**
077   * The Metaschema <a href=
078   * "https://pages.nist.gov/metaschema/specification/datatypes/#uri">uri</a> data
079   * type instance.
080   */
081  @NonNull
082  public static final UriAdapter URI = new UriAdapter();
083  /**
084   * The Metaschema <a href=
085   * "https://pages.nist.gov/metaschema/specification/datatypes/#uri-reference">uri-reference</a>
086   * data type instance.
087   */
088  @NonNull
089  public static final UriReferenceAdapter URI_REFERENCE = new UriReferenceAdapter();
090  /**
091   * The Metaschema <a href=
092   * "https://pages.nist.gov/metaschema/specification/datatypes/#uuid">uuid</a>
093   * data type instance.
094   */
095  @NonNull
096  public static final UuidAdapter UUID = new UuidAdapter();
097  /**
098   * The Metaschema <a href=
099   * "https://pages.nist.gov/metaschema/specification/datatypes/#day-time-duration">day-time-duration</a>
100   * data type instance.
101   */
102  @NonNull
103  public static final DayTimeAdapter DAY_TIME_DURATION = new DayTimeAdapter();
104  /**
105   * The Metaschema <a href=
106   * "https://pages.nist.gov/metaschema/specification/datatypes/#year-month-duration">year-month-duration</a>
107   * data type instance.
108   */
109  @NonNull
110  public static final YearMonthAdapter YEAR_MONTH_DURATION = new YearMonthAdapter();
111  /**
112   * The Metaschema <a href=
113   * "https://pages.nist.gov/metaschema/specification/datatypes/#decimal">decimal</a>
114   * data type instance.
115   */
116  @NonNull
117  public static final DecimalAdapter DECIMAL = new DecimalAdapter();
118  /**
119   * The Metaschema <a href=
120   * "https://pages.nist.gov/metaschema/specification/datatypes/#integer">integer</a>
121   * data type instance.
122   */
123  @NonNull
124  public static final IntegerAdapter INTEGER = new IntegerAdapter();
125  /**
126   * The Metaschema <a href=
127   * "https://pages.nist.gov/metaschema/specification/datatypes/#non-negative-integer">non-negative-integer</a>
128   * data type instance.
129   */
130  @NonNull
131  public static final NonNegativeIntegerAdapter NON_NEGATIVE_INTEGER = new NonNegativeIntegerAdapter();
132  /**
133   * The Metaschema <a href=
134   * "https://pages.nist.gov/metaschema/specification/datatypes/#positive-integer">positive-integer</a>
135   * data type instance.
136   */
137  @NonNull
138  public static final PositiveIntegerAdapter POSITIVE_INTEGER = new PositiveIntegerAdapter();
139  /**
140   * The Metaschema <a href=
141   * "https://pages.nist.gov/metaschema/specification/datatypes/#email-address">email-address</a>
142   * data type instance.
143   */
144  @NonNull
145  public static final EmailAddressAdapter EMAIL_ADDRESS = new EmailAddressAdapter();
146  /**
147   * The Metaschema <a href=
148   * "https://pages.nist.gov/metaschema/specification/datatypes/#hostname">hostname</a>
149   * data type instance.
150   */
151  @NonNull
152  public static final HostnameAdapter HOSTNAME = new HostnameAdapter();
153  /**
154   * The Metaschema <a href=
155   * "https://pages.nist.gov/metaschema/specification/datatypes/#ncname">ncname</a>
156   * data type instance.
157   */
158  @Deprecated(since = "0.7.0")
159  @NonNull
160  public static final NcNameAdapter NCNAME = new NcNameAdapter();
161  /**
162   * The Metaschema <a href=
163   * "https://pages.nist.gov/metaschema/specification/datatypes/#string">string</a>
164   * data type instance.
165   */
166  @NonNull
167  public static final StringAdapter STRING = new StringAdapter();
168  /**
169   * The Metaschema time data type instance.
170   */
171  // FIXME: add documentation link
172  @NonNull
173  public static final TimeAdapter TIME = new TimeAdapter();
174  /**
175   * The Metaschema time with timezone data type instance.
176   */
177  // FIXME: add documentation link
178  @NonNull
179  public static final TimeWithTZAdapter TIME_WITH_TZ = new TimeWithTZAdapter();
180  /**
181   * The Metaschema <a href=
182   * "https://pages.nist.gov/metaschema/specification/datatypes/#token">token</a>
183   * data type instance.
184   */
185  @NonNull
186  public static final TokenAdapter TOKEN = new TokenAdapter();
187  /**
188   * The default Metaschema data type instance to use when no data type is defined
189   * on a field or flag.
190   */
191  @NonNull
192  public static final StringAdapter DEFAULT_DATA_TYPE = STRING;
193
194  /**
195   * Initialize the built-in data types.
196   */
197  public MetaschemaDataTypeProvider() {
198    // The data type "string" must be first since this is the default data type for
199    // the {@link String}
200    // Java type. This ensures that when a data type is resolved that this data type
201    // is matched first
202    // before other String-based data types.
203    register(STRING);
204    register(BASE64);
205    register(BOOLEAN);
206    register(DATE);
207    register(DATE_WITH_TZ);
208    register(DATE_TIME);
209    register(DATE_TIME_WITH_TZ);
210    register(DAY_TIME_DURATION);
211    register(DECIMAL);
212    register(EMAIL_ADDRESS);
213    register(HOSTNAME);
214    register(INTEGER);
215    register(IP_V4_ADDRESS);
216    register(IP_V6_ADDRESS);
217    register(NON_NEGATIVE_INTEGER);
218    register(POSITIVE_INTEGER);
219    register(TOKEN);
220    register(URI);
221    register(URI_REFERENCE);
222    register(UUID);
223    register(YEAR_MONTH_DURATION);
224
225    // register abstract types
226    register(TypeConstants.ANY_ATOMIC_TYPE);
227    // register(TypeConstants.UNTYPED_ATOMIC_TYPE);
228    register(TypeConstants.DURATION_TYPE);
229    register(TypeConstants.IP_ADDRESS_TYPE);
230    register(TypeConstants.NUMERIC_TYPE);
231    register(TypeConstants.TEMPORAL_TYPE);
232  }
233}
